Articles.Content:
I mostly made this to help out a buddy, but figured I'd keep it generic enough that maybe some of the other new players could benefit.

None of you seasoned Kerbal pilots are going to learn anything from it, but new guys? Maybe?

Anyhow, here it is (excuse my bad video compression - still learning)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LwYFKnvVcvk
